Tabular Editor For Beginners

Thank you to Dhruvin Shah and Delhi Power BI User Group for inviting me to present. This was my first time presenting at a PBUG from India so it was special ! Please watch and feel free to reach out to me on twitter @Pawarbi or drop comments below if you have any questions. Topics/features covered:

  • Why use Tabular Editor ?
  • Demo of three types of features:
    • Productivity features
    • Features that are not yet available in Power BI
    • Automation features
